Harnessing Our Medical Expertise To Build Best Test Offering!
Quality Laboratory Testing Services!
With a belief that knowledge is power, we connect our patients directly with their results so they have valuable health information when they need it most, care about our people and are committed to excellence in the work we do.

Harnessing Our Medical Expertise To Build Best Test Offering!
We Deliver World Class Diagnostics!
With a belief that knowledge is power, we connect our patients directly with their results so they have valuable health information when they need it most, care about our people and are committed to excellence in the work we do.

Book a Home Visit
Providing High Quality Test Services For Your Health!

Continually Harnessing Our Medical Expertise To Build Best Test Offering!

With a belief that knowledge is power, we connect our patients directly with their results so they have valuable health information when they need it most, care about our people and are committed to excellence in the work we do for people to grow and strive for excellence.
Safety is a vital part of this process, and so we identified and discussed several key factors and considerations around safety in vaccine development provides insights.
Book a Lab Visit
Maria Kriss
Our Founder
Helping To Deliver Answers For Health Questions!

Fixed Commitment To Excellence And Quality Of Our Test Results.

The insights we gain through testing then fuel our drug development practice, by identifying patterns and individuals who might benefit from enrollment in specific drug trials with the support of diagnostics capabilities to deliver reliable data.
To provide a comfortable and safe environment for our patients, please avoid wearing scented perfumes or creams when visiting us.
Values and Culture
Provider Registration

Improving Health Through Automation

Partnering for Through our investment in new high volume chemistry tech, we brought next generation.

Health Outcomes

Building a healthier world clearly means looking at the future genetics and being ready for using it.

Innovations Vaccines & Drug Development

We care for our patients, each other and our communities and excellence is the standard of working quality.

Improving Health Through Automation

Trusted Data For Clear Health Decisions

Your focus is on providing patients the best possible care and we’re here to help. To complement our menu of tests, we provide our registered healthcare professionals to support your testing needs.
Accreditation & Licensing
Meet our Leaders

I'm a Healthcare Provider

We pioneer in clinical testing with industry leaders to make sure your patients have the information.
Provider Registration

I'm a Patient

We do that by offering tests that focus on prevention & early identification of potential health conditions.

Whether you are a provider or patient, when you need trusted information to make confident health decisions, consider us. Our Specialty Areas

Providing High Quality Test Services For Your Health!

General Diagnostic Testing

We are leader in ensuring exceptional quality testing in our facilities, driven by a passion to ensure you have critical information about your health give you access to diagnostic...
Explore More

Specialized Genetic Testing

Genetic testing can be useful at different stages of life, like discovering that a family member has a condition that can be passed down or struggling to find treatment....
Explore More

Naturopathic Lab Testing

From hormone levels, to food reactions, to identifying environmental toxins, we provide you with objective information so you can map your path to health and wellness....
Explore More

Food Sensitivity Testing

IgG food reactions can take hours or days to develop, making difficult to determine which food is responsible for the reaction without doing testing fast and specific way....
Explore More

Genova Diagnostics Testing

Genova Diagnostics is an internationally renowned lab committed to only the highest standards. Chronic diseases are complex, but with Genova's system-based testing....
Explore More

Hormone Insights Testing

Hormones are essential for the body to function optimally. Imbalances may result in many health conditions. Hormone Insights is a detailed urine analysis that measures....
Explore More
To reduce your wait time, complete the personal information on the form in advance, some tests may not be covered!
Tests and Services
Providing High Quality Test Services For Your Health!

Helping To Deliver Answers
For Health Questions.

25+ Years Of Experience
Appointments may be booked to help reduce your wait time. If you are unable to book an appointment, we do our best to minimize your wait, but the length of your visit will depend on the number of patients in the Patient Service Centre. Typically, wait times are a little longer in the morning as patients tend to fast for tests over night.
To provide a comfortable and safe environment for our patients and employees, please avoid wearing scented perfumes or creams when visiting our Patient Service Centres.
World Class Diagnostics
We have developed some of the world's most advanced testing capabilities to help improve health and lives.
Leader in Drug Development
With the support of our diagnostics capabilities to deliver drug trials that are both reliable and rigorous,
We process more than 3 million patient specimens per week and help medical professionals and patients make important health decisions, by identifying patterns and even individuals who might benefit from enrollment in specific drug trials.
Where We Can Provide Help!

Providing High Quality Test Services For Your Health!

Find The Right Test For Your Health Needs!

With over 50 years of experience, we provide customized programs to support your occupational health, employee wellness and medical surveillance programs. We are committed to providing high-quality and convenient health monitoring, collection and testing.
Insurance Plans
How it works
I was suffering from such horrible migraines I had no idea what to do, I tried everything. I'd had allergy testing done and everything was negative. 48 hrs after cutting out foods, I felt human again.
I was suffering from such horrible migraines I had no idea what to do, I tried everything. I'd had allergy testing done and everything was negative. 48 hrs after cutting out foods, I felt human again.

Book A Lab Visit

Please feel welcome to contact our friendly reception staff with any general or medical enquiry. Our doctors will receive or return any urgent calls.
